title: A font from a recent game
content:
Most likely a custom font. Am looking only for the one they use for the numbers on this shot at the bottom and the "page 1/3" in the image located here: [http://games.gamepressure.com/view\_screen.asp?ID=295460](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317122400/http:/games.gamepressure.com/view_screen.asp?ID=295460 "http://games.gamepressure.com/view\_screen.asp?ID=295460")

Other image here: [http://games.gamepressure.com/view\_screen.asp?ID=295461](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317122400/http:/games.gamepressure.com/view_screen.asp?ID=295461 "http://games.gamepressure.com/view\_screen.asp?ID=295461") - note the uniqueness of the comma on the bottom right area.

Pretty sure this is custom but I love the way this font looks and would love to find it somewhere if it's available.

Font: 

 Fontworks Inc/ComicReggaeStd 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317122400/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")
author: falcron

comments.content:
Seems to be: Fontworks Inc/ComicReggaeStd  
 [http://translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=ja&u=http://fontworks.co.jp/font/catch/comicreggae/&prev=search](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317122400/http:/translate.google.com/translate?hl=en&sl=ja&u=http://fontworks.co.jp/font/catch/comicreggae/&prev=search)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317122400im_/http:/typophile.com/files/page1_4512.jpg)
  
Select "Font sample" from the web site:
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317122400im_/http:/typophile.com/files/page2_4655.jpg)
Thank you!! This is it! Wonderful!!!!
